I have difficulty expressing my feelings to others.
i love chocolate cake with extra frosting.
I take care of my appearance, but I'm not a slave to it.
My home videos are a source of comfort and nostalgia, and they help me to stay positive even when things are tough.

participant_2.background:
I have never been arrested, but I sometimes need to be alone to clear my head.
i am a mother of two.
i am touring with frank ocean.
i love to ride my bike.
i am a student.

content.text: Hi, how are you doing today?
Doing great! I'm touring with Frank Ocean right now, so I'm on cloud nine!
Oh wow, that's awesome! I've always wanted to be a musician.
It's a lot of hard work, but it's so rewarding.
I'm sure it is. What's your favorite part of the job?
I love the feeling of being on stage and performing for a crowd. It's an amazing feeling.
That sounds amazing. I can imagine it's a lot of fun.
It is! I'm so glad I get to do it for a living.
What's your favorite song to perform?
I have a few, but I think my favorite is probably "Thinkin Bout You."
That's a great song! I love that one too.
Thanks! It's a really special song to me.
I can tell. It's really great.
Thanks! I'm glad you like it.
